channel.title: 3 Problems I really need help with {PI}
channel.description:
[size=12pt]First off I am using a PI server. My first issue is my servers crossbows work great when im fighting npc's but when I use in wild they say you cannot use this bolt type with this crossbow, With every type of bolt.
My next issue is my drops. They dont show up period not even bones. There is a section in npc handler where if i add the npc id it will drop bones but I cant find where to add the drops. Ihave the drops coded in Npcdrops.java yet they dont drop.
Lastly My hitsplats show up twice. <-- no fuckin clue what to do here lol[/size]

item.title: 3 Problems I really need help with {PI}
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The more you rage, the less we help.
Just saying.
Oh, and how the tits does your c’bow work vs. npc when you can’t use ammo in them?

Read full topic
item.source: 3 Problems I really need help with {PI}

item.title: 3 Problems I really need help with {PI}
item.dc:creator: @kyler887 kyler887
item.description:
@kyler887 wrote:

[size=12pt]First off I am using a PI server.
My first issue is my servers crossbows work great when im fighting npc’s
but when I use in wild they say you cannot use this bolt type with this crossbow, With every type of bolt.

My next issue is my drops. They dont show up period not even bones. There is a section in npc handler where if i add the npc id it will drop bones but I cant find where to add the drops. Ihave the drops coded in Npcdrops.java yet they dont drop.

Lastly My hitsplats show up twice. <-- no fuckin clue what to do here lol[/size]
